original_text: Moses said to Aaron, ‘Why did you agree to do this? What did the people do to you? You have made them guilty of a great sin.’
korean_text: 모세가 아론에게 이르되 이 백성이 당신에게 어떻게 하였기에 당신이 그들을 큰 죄에 빠지게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Why did you agree to do this?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 너는 이런 일을 하기로 동의했느냐?

sentences.original_text: What did the people do to you?
